//{
/*
Success is a matter of hanging on, when others have let go.
Its not who you are, that holds you back, its who you think you are not.
The future belongs to those, who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
*/
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include<vector>
#include<bitset>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<time.h>
#include<map>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007LL
#define LL long long
#define ULL long long
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define ABS(x)   ((x)<0?-(x):(x))
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sf(n) scanf("%f",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define slu(n) scanf("%llu",&n)
#define sd(n) scanf("%lf",&n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define REP(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)//repeat n times
#define FOR(i,start,end) for(int i=start;i<end;i++)//end not included
#define FORR(i,n) for(int i=n;i>=0;i--)//reverse for
void swaps (char *x, char *y){char temp;temp = *x;*x = *y;*y = temp;}
void swapi(int *a, int *b){int temp;temp = *a;*a =*b;*b=temp;}
ULL gcd(ULL a, ULL b){
    if(a==0)return b;
	if (b == 0) return a;
	if (a == 1 or b == 1) return 1;
	if (a == b) return a;
    if (a > b) return gcd(b, a%b);
	else return gcd(a, b%a);
}
ULL numFromArray(char arr[]){
    int len = strlen(arr);
    ULL num=0;int temp;
    FOR(i,0,len){
        temp = arr[i]-48;
        num = num*10+temp;
    }
    return num;
}
//}
ULL bookPossible(ULL digits){
	ULL ans=0,i=0;
	while(digits - (9*(int)pow(10,i)*(i+1))>0){
		digits = digits - (9*(int)pow(10,i)*(i+1)) ;
		ans =ans + 9*(int)pow(10,i);
		i++;
	}
	if(digits%(i+1)==0){
	ans=ans+(digits)/(i+1);
	return ans;
	}
	else {
		return -1;
	}
}
void precompute(){
}//end precompute
void refresh(){
}//end refresh
void doThis(){
    char a[11];
    ss(a);
    while(a[0]!='#'){
        ULL num= numFromArray(a);
        ULL x;
        if(( x = bookPossible(num))!=-1){
            printf("%lld\n",x);
        }else{
            puts("Impossible!");
        }

        memset(a,0,11);
        ss(a);
    }

}//end doThis

int main(){
#ifdef amy
freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
freopen("log.txt", "w", stderr);
#endif
    int t;
	precompute();
	t=1;
	//scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
	    doThis();
    }//end while
#ifdef amy
fprintf(stdout, "\nTime taken : %.3lf   sec\n", (double) clock() /(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));
#endif

	return 0;
}//end main
